title: Sky in the Key Lime Pie
description: A Cuban-American teen grapples with lust, loss, and love during a perilous venture in this gripping and humorous, slightly suspenseful, original novel.Seductive Kaela lures Wyles into her obsession, cloaked in beauty, reverence and secrecy, and he loses himself in a dangerous "sacred" world. When he falls for Hailey, a believer in ancient oracles, he knows he can't have it both ways and plans his escape.Set in the steamy streets of Miami, filled with humor, heartbreak, and tough decisions, Sky in the Key Lime Pie offers a bittersweet slice of paradise.
author: Wyatt Pattinson
